column1: Former Everton ballboy Gylfi Sigurdsson relieved to be back at club
Gylfi Sigurdssons stunner sees Everton past Hajduk Split and into group stage
They have added Wayne Rooney, Gylfi Sigurdsson and Michael Keane but are EFC any better off than last season
I know we are more than good enough to turn this around.Gylfi Sigurdsson on Everton's recent form. More here:
